attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We now have a Prime Minister who the public did not vote into Office ,and now a member of the cabinet, ie Peter Mandelson who apparently is not an MP, can someone enlighten me if this is correct, and if so, how is this representing the peoples wishes and therefore democratic.

It appears we really do not have a democratic Government in certain areas of responsibility , well done Labour!!!

Still at least Mandelson could show us all how to get cheap mortgages.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
